tr.td: The destination directory for all of the generated Javadocs. The default value is ${maven.docs.dest}/apidocs.
Specifies whether or not the @author text is included in the generated Javadocs. The default value is true.
Specifies whether or not all classes and members are included in the generated Javadocs. The default value is false.
Specifies whether or not the @version text is included in the generated Javadocs. The default value is true.
Specifies whether or not a "use" page is generated for each class and member. The default value is true.
